import { clothingList, hasBottom, hasHeadWear, hasTop, isFootWear, isVest, } from "../../../utilities"; import Clothing from "../Clothing"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const MeasurementsForm = ({ clothingOptions, setClothingOptions, setDishdashaLength, setShirtType, setGarmentLength, setPantsLength, setShortsLength, setDressLength, setCollar, setShoulders, setSleeve, setShirtSleeve, setDressSleeve, setDescription, setSleepwearSleeve, setChest, setBelly, setWaist, setHips, setArmHole, setBicepTricep, loading, setElbow, setWrist, setInseam, setThigh, setCalf, setLegFoot, setBackWidth, setBackHeight, setSpecialOrder, setNotes, }) => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( <>

)} {/* {clothingOptions.length > 0 && ( )} */}
